Text: Yes, typo / sp - dissolve .  Get over it.

The attitude you evoke in your posts, the admonitions & self-righteous tone of all your remarks, particularly shouting (ALL CAPS)  - you give peace a bad name, man.  You sure don't come across as "non-violent". Why don't you lighten up?
